section.p: This Class contains the process by which the Veterans Affairs documents information to enroll the veteran in the spinal cord domain for the episode of care.
This Class contains the process by which the Veterans Affairs documents information to enroll the veteran in the spinal cord domain for the episode of care.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateFirstSeen with data type Point In Time
Contains the first date the veteran was seen for SCI care
Contains the first date the veteran was seen for SCI care

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateLastReviewed with data type Point In Time
Contains the last date the veterans registration record was reviewed .
Contains the last date the veterans registration record was reviewed .

Contains zero or one [0..1] dateOfDeath with data type Point In Time
Contains the veterans date of death.
Contains the veterans date of death.

Contains at least one [1..*] dateRevised with data type Point In Time
Contains the current and historical change dates for the veteran
Contains the current and historical change dates for the veteran

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Unique identifier that identifies this Episode of care for the veteran.
Unique identifier that identifies this Episode of care for the veteran.

Contains exactly one [1..1] percentProvidedByVa with data type Integer
Contains the portion of care provided by VA.
Contains the portion of care provided by VA.

Contains exactly one [1..1] registrationStatus with data type Code
Contains the code set that identifies the Registration status of the veteran
Contains the code set that identifies the Registration status of the veteran
Contains zero or more [0..*] ancillaryRegistrationEvent, where its type is Ancillary Registration Event

Contains zero or more [0..*] etiology, where its type is Etiology Observation
Association to the class that identifies the
Association to the class that identifies the cause or origin of a spinal cord injury as determined by medical diagnosis.
Association to the class that identifies the cause or origin of a spinal cord injury as determined by medical diagnosis.

Contains at least one [1..*] evaluation , where its type is Evaluation Event
Association to the class that identifies the information for the Veterans evaluation session.
Association to the class that identifies the information for the Veterans evaluation session.

Contains at least one [1..*] medicalCentersVisted, where its type is Spinal Cord Medical Centers Visted
Association to the class that identifies the current and historic medical centers that provided services for the veteran
Association to the class that identifies the current and historic medical centers that provided services for the veteran
Contains zero or more [0..*] militaryServiceEpisode, where its type is Military Service Episode
Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient

Contains at least one [1..*] referral, where its type is Referral Event
Association to the class that identifies the information for the Veterans referrals.
Association to the class that identifies the information for the Veterans referrals.

Contains at least one [1..*] sciCoordinator, where its type is Sci Administration
Identifies the SCI Coordinators who are providing or have provided Spinal Cord Injury - related services to the Veteran

Contains zero or more [0..*] spinalCordEpisodeOfCare, where its type is Spinal Cord Episode Of Care
Association to the process by which the Veterans Affairs documents information to enroll the veteran in the spinal cord domain for the episode of care.
